mapper.sql: id, name, label, parentid, is_show, orderby, is_leaf
mapper.select: WITH RECURSIVE cte AS ( SELECT id, name, label, parentid, is_show, orderby, is_leaf FROM course_category WHERE id = #{id} UNION ALL SELECT cc.id, cc.name, cc.label, cc.parentid, cc.is_show, cc.orderby, cc.is_leaf FROM course_category cc JOIN cte ON cc.parentid = cte.id ) SELECT id, name, label, parentid, is_show, orderby, is_leaf FROM cte ORDER BY id, orderby
